mapper.select: SELECT r.record_id AS recordId, r.record_title AS recordTitle, t.reg_date AS regDate, r.original_img AS originalImg, r.detect_img AS detectImg, r.he_type AS heType, r.he_number AS heNumber, r.access AS access FROM type_info t JOIN he_record r ON t.type_id = r.type_id ORDER BY r.record_id DESC

SELECT r.record_id AS recordId, r.record_title AS recordTitle, t.reg_date AS regDate, r.original_img AS originalImg, r.detect_img AS detectImg, r.he_type AS heType, r.he_number AS heNumber, r.access AS access FROM type_info t JOIN he_record r ON t.type_id = r.type_id WHERE r.record_id = #{recordId}
